There were some things that made the reform dress a decided blessing. With it the ridiculous hoops, which were then the fashion, could not possibly be worn; nor the long, trailing skirts, sweeping up the filth of the streets. But in recent years a more sensible style of dress has been adopted by the world, which does not embrace these objectionable 
                                                                           442
features; and if our sisters wish to make their dresses after these models, simple and plain, the Lord will not be dishonored by their doing so.
